mapper.insert: insert into t_cart (userId, skuId, num, price, totalprice) values (#{userId}, #{skuId}, #{num}, #{price}, #{totalprice})
mapper.select: select count(id) from t_cart where userid = #{userId}

select cart.*, t.goodsId, t.name, t.url, t.skuNum, t.value from t_cart as cart left join (select goods.id as goodsid, goods.name as name, sku.num as skuNum, val.val as value, val.skuid as skuid, img.url from t_goods_sku as sku left join t_goods as goods on sku.goodsid = goods.id left join t_goods_image as img on sku.id = img.skuid left join (select skuid, GROUP_CONCAT(value) as val from t_goods_pro_val group by skuid) as val on sku.id = val.skuid) as t on cart.skuid = t.skuid where cart.userid = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_cart where id in (${cartIds})
mapper.select: select * from t_cart where userid = #{userId} and skuid = #{skuId}

select cart.*, t.goodsId, t.name, t.url, t.skuNum, t.value from t_cart as cart left join (select goods.id as goodsid, goods.name as name, sku.num as skuNum, val.val as value, val.skuid as skuid, img.url from t_goods_sku as sku left join t_goods as goods on sku.goodsid = goods.id left join t_goods_image as img on sku.id = img.skuid left join (select skuid, GROUP_CONCAT(value) as val from t_goods_pro_val group by skuid) as val on sku.id = val.skuid) as t on cart.skuid = t.skuid where cart.userid = #{userId} and cart.id in (${cartIds})
select * from t_cart where id in (${cartIds}) and userId = #{userId}
